options.optiboxes.title: OptiBoxes Configuration
options.optiboxes.process_optifine.toolt: If enabled, the mod will attempt to read/load OptiFine Custom Skies.
options.optiboxes.process_mcpatcher.tool: If enabled, the mod will attempt to read/load MCPatcher Custom Skies.
options.optiboxes.render_sun_moon.toolti: Enable/disable rendering of the sun and moon.
